name: PowerShell
description: Installs PowerShell along with needed dependencies. Useful for base Dockerfiles that often are missing required install dependencies like gpg.

version.description: Select or enter a version of PowerShell.

modules.description: Optional comma separated list of PowerShell modules to install. If you need to install a specific version of a module, use '==' to specify the version (e.g. 'az.resources==2.5.0').

powershellProfileURL.description: Optional (publicly accessible) URL to download PowerShell profile.

github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: This dev container includes PowerShell along with needed dependencies pre-installed and available on the `PATH`, along with the PowerShell extension..
